price: (84) So be not impatient over them. We only count out [i.e., allow] to them a [limited] number.[827]
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا
footnotes: [827]- Of breaths, of days, or of evil deeds.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
